text: Picket Fence has been my son's childcare since he started PG and they have faithfully and wholeheartedly taken care of my son throughout his 3 years journey. No regrets sending my son to Picket Fence at all. Admin wise there was some small hiccups at the start but it was resolved professionally. Teaching and childcare wise is excellent. The teachers had big loving hearts, patience and understands children. I truly respect childcare teachers for their dedication and hard work amidst the challenges they face. Thank you Picket Fence, teachers and staff, for making my son's preschool journey an amazing one.

My son graduated in Picket Fence Preschool Tampines and we are grateful and thankful to all the Teachers.
They all very helpful and friendly and the center have good communication to the parents.

Thank you Teachers❤️

I’m really appreciated & thankful to all the teachers. Everyone have did their job well throughout my daughter’s 3 yrs journey in picket fence. My daughter really enjoyed her journey a lot. Will highly recommend..

My son just graduated from picket fence and I got see positive and negative reviews but for me personally the things they teach are good and the teachers is caring for the students.Will recommend this school if any of my friends/relatives are looking for preschool.
Thank you Picket Fence for always looking after my daughter for the last 4 years. I am sad to be leaving as i am moving house. Really appreciate the teachers who are looking after my children well.
